content: OffshoreBlue Rig A: floating production unit, 1,200 m water depth, producing ~40k bbl/day.
DesertDrill Site B: onshore pad, 3 gas condensate wells, pipeline tie-in to local processing.
metadata: Ref: EXP-102, manager: gina.rossi@desertdrill.com, daily output ~25 MMcf

content: ShalePeak Pad Alpha: multi-stage fracking, 2 wells online, EOR pilot planned.
metadata: Ref: EXP-103, shift lead: hiro.tanaka@shalepeak.com, current rate ~15k bbl/day

content: ArcticLight Platform X: ice-class platform, produced test flow ~5k bbl/day, more wells pending.
metadata: Ref: EXP-104, site geologist: ivy.kim@arcticlight.com, extreme cold ops

content: FrontierGas Plant #1: sour gas processing, high-sulfur capture, 150 MMcf/day capacity.
metadata: Ref: EXP-105, data logs to jeff.teeter@frontiergas.com, expansion possible
